comments.body: Does the current behaviour satisfy your original motivation in the PR description? For example, if there are many small partitions, the collect result size could be much bigger, right?

That's why we check when encoding each partition (to fail fast if a single partition is already too big) and also we sum up the sizes of all partitions when decoding (to fail if the total collected size of all partitions is too big). So yes, this does satisfy my original motivation.
